term.title: vidicon

item.text: A vacuum tube containing a photosensitive area, or target, and an electron gun to read the signal from the target. The silicon target consists of a two-dimensional array of Si-photodiodes having a common cathode and isolated anodes. Irradiation of the target causes the production of electron-hole pairs which, by recombination, leads to a depletion of the surface charge.
